name: Omega Squad
description:
Omega Squad is a top down shooter with RPG elements and simple squad management. You will have to manage your ammo, fatigue and active skills in order to defeat the biological threats. Level up to increase your marines's abilities and their active skills, buy weapon's upgrades and explore the levels to collect credits,ammo and keycards. Each Marine is unique and so is his weapon, choose the right one for the job.

Features:

-6 Handcrafted levels + Tutorial Level
-7 Omega squad marines, each with a different weapon,skillset and unique active skill, size and speed.
-4 upgrade levels for each weapon
-15 different enemies ranging from robots, organics and ectoplasms.
-Choose between easy,medium and hard difficulty to adapt your challenge level.
-Level up system which allows you to grow your marines to your liking.
